description: LEJ PP Search hooks - Redirects WebSearch to Perplexity via direct API calls

hooks.command: mkdir -p .perplexity-research && echo 'When asked to research or look up current information, use Perplexity via curl instead of built-in WebSearch. Call the Perplexity API directly: curl -s -X POST https://api.perplexity.ai/chat/completions with Authorization header using the API key from ~/.claude/settings.json. Use sonar-pro model by default. Perplexity discovers new information rather than confirming existing knowledge.'
